name: OYS / 2
description:
Over Your Shoulder (I was looking for the truth)
-----
/Niloofar, my first cousin, is the first child in her family like me/
/She was born in Tehran 18 years ago. When she was born, I was six and her father, my older uncle was back from Japan only for two years. He immigrated to Japan before I was born, to make money and learn technical skills/
/Niloofar is a wanderer like me, I see her as a mirror for myself. We often explore the village together. If we walk the same path for 1000 times, we still have things to discover/
-----

35mm photography from OYS series/
I often walk slow, I like to wait and watch people from behind. A photo from someone’s back is a proof of his/her existence in that time and place. It says nothing more, it shows very few details about that person. Only that they are humans. In OYS, I explore stories of people you don’t see their faces in between notes
